speaker: Dream Therapist
dialog: So what brings you here today?

speaker: lucy
dialog: I’ve been having trouble sleeping...it started with the nightmares but the problem started to affect my day as well.

speaker: Dream Therapist
dialog: It says on your file that you have been experiencing memory loss as well?

speaker: lucy
dialog: Yes, I sometimes forget chunks of my life, but I’m still so young, so I wonder what could be causing this.

speaker: Dream Therapist
dialog: I believe that your memories are somehow locked away in your dreams. Thankfully, our newest technology allows you to access those memories, but...

speaker: Dream Therapist
dialog: You would have to get them back yourself.

speaker: lucy
dialog: Meaning… go inside my dream and get my memories?

speaker: Dream Therapist
dialog: Yes, precisely. To make it easier, you will have a helper of sorts. All you have to do is follow them and they will help you recover your memories.

speaker: Dream Therapist
dialog: Of course it is, there’s nothing to worry about!
